text: aap un ke mamlath mein khuda ki nazil karda wahi ke mutabiq hee hukm kiya ki jiye,un ki qwahisho ki tabedari na ki jiye aur un se hoshyar rahiye,ke kahi ye aap ko Allah ke utare hoe kisi hukm se idhar udhar na kare,agar ye log muh pher le tuh yaqin kare ke Allah ka irada yahi hai ke unhe unke baz gunaho ki saza de hee daa le aur aksar log na-farmaan hee hote hai
